articles.description: We’d book Chicken Shack in a room above a pub for £30. And in a male-dominated scene, the shy singer proved her worth with a magical voice
articles.content: When I met Christine McVie she was still Christine Perfect, the singer and piano player in the band Chicken Shack. I say met this amounted to me plugging in her microphone, bringing her a glass of wa… [+4038 chars]

articles.author: BFI
articles.title: Revealed: the results of the 2022 Sight and Sound Greatest Films of All Time poll - British Film Institute
articles.description: For the first time in the poll’s 70-year history, a film by a female filmmaker takes the top spot: Chantal Akerman’s Jeanne Dielman, 23 quai du Commerce, 1080 Bruxelles.
articles.content: The winner of Sight and Sound magazines hugely anticipated and world-renowned Greatest Films of All Time Critics poll 2022 is Chantal Akermans Jeanne Dielman, 23 quai du Commerce, 1080 Bruxelles (197… [+13069 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Brad William Henke, star of Orange is the New Black, dies aged 56 - Sky News
articles.content:
Actor and former NFL player Brad William Henke has died at the age of 56, his family has said.
Henke passed away on 29 November in his sleep, and no cause of death was given.
